channel.title: How do i make myself owner?
channel.description: Okay, I know this sounds pretty retarted, but I have no clue on how to make myself owner.. I'm using the Thrillscape server. When I edit the owner file, I put in what I would want as User and Password. When I login, Im a normal player... HELP

item.title: How do i make myself owner?
item.dc:creator: @hanny hanny
item.description:
@hanny wrote:

idiot rofl i even know how noob!!!

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make myself owner?

item.title: How do i make myself owner?
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

JoshRawly:

If your using 317, goto your source, then goto Data->Src->Characters And then click your name search (with Ctrl + f) rights and it should be highlighted blue, then where it says 0 change that to 3 for owner 2 for co-owner or 1 for moderator.

:o seriously? 2 for co-owner? it’s admin :s

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make myself owner?

item.title: How do i make myself owner?
item.dc:creator: @JoshRawly JoshRawly
item.description:
@JoshRawly wrote:

If your using 317, goto your source, then goto Data->Src->Characters And then click your name search (with Ctrl + f) rights and it should be highlighted blue, then where it says 0 change that to 3 for owner 2 for co-owner or 1 for moderator.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make myself owner?
item.dc:creator: @anthonyduka anthonyduka
item.description:
@anthonyduka wrote:

Go into your servers character files then double click on your account. There should be something that says rights =, make sure thats 3, instead of 0.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make myself owner?

item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

reconpk:

Okay, I know this sounds pretty retarted, but I have no clue on how to make myself owner… I’m using the Thrillscape server. When I edit the owner file, I put in what I would want as User and Password. When I login, Im a normal player… HELP

make playerRights = 3
